name: Buru Energy Limited
description: Buru Energy Limited is an Australian oil and gas exploration and production company focused on the development of hydrocarbon resources in the Canning Basin of Western Australia. Founded in 2008, Buru operates with a commitment to sustainable practices while aiming to unlock the potential of the region's resources. The company has a diverse portfolio of assets, including the highly prospective Laurel and Yulleroo gas fields, as well as various exploration permits. Buru is dedicated to advancing its projects through innovative technologies and strategic partnerships, and it actively engages with local communities to ensure responsible resource management. With a growing focus on natural gas, Buru Energy aims to contribute to the energy needs of Western Australia and beyond while minimizing its environmental impact. The company is also exploring opportunities in emerging markets and is keenly aware of the global transition to cleaner energy sources. Buru Energy’s vision is to be a key player in the Australian energy landscape, providing reliable energy solutions while adhering to the highest standards of corporate governance and environmental stewardship.
